description.originalText: Paris is an energetic and resourceful worker. She helped me with cleaning and organization tasks once a week for almost a year. She was reliable and fun to work with. I was very grateful for her help.

description.displayText: We absolutely love Paris! W, my 19 month old, immediately took to her kind and gentle spirit (babies and toddlers are the best at reading people's energy). Paris listened and always  followed my instructions to the "tee." I limit my daughter's screen time, so Paris came prepared with fun, creative art & craft activities for W to do during the day. She is so DEPENDABLE & CONSISTENT! That's wonderful if you're a working parent, or need to run a timely errand. I know she's going to be here, the exact day she's scheduled, and on time! I know that W is well-cared for in Paris' care, and that's a peace parents need. They say it "takes a village." And it does! I am so grateful to have Paris apart of ours.
